// Help Info 1
How do I use the app?
Step 1: Add a vehicle number in the Vehicle Section. \nStep 2: Set a vehicle as primary. \nStep 3: Select the floor you parked your vehicle. \nStep 4: Type your parking lot number. \nStep 5: Click on "Start Parking" button. \n*The timer will start to track your parking time.* \nStep 6: Click on "End Parking" button to end parking. \nStep 7: Click on "Pay" button to pay for parking. \n*Will redirect you to the Sunway Official Payment Website.*
// Help Info 2
Display vehicle number (Home Page)
How do I display the vehicle number on the home page: \nStep 1: Go to Vehicle Page. \nStep 2: Click on the "add" button to add a vehicle number. \nStep 3: Long click on the chosen vehicle to set as primary. \nStep 4: Return to home page. \n \nHow do I change the primary vehicle? \nStep 1: Click on the "add" button to add a vehicle number. \nStep 2: Add another vehicle number. \nStep 3: Long click on the preferred vehicle number.
// Help Info 3
Features of the app
Features of the app as the following: \nGet live view of the parking lots available. \nGet an estimated time on the time parked in the parking lot. \nWrite down your parking lot number for future reference. \nCheck the user parking history.
// Help Info 4
Parking rates
Monday to Friday \nFirst hour or part thereof - RM1 \nSubsequent hour or part thereof - RM1 \nMaximum per entry per day - RM5 \n \nSaturday, Sunday & Public Holidays \nFirst hour or part thereof - RM1 \nSubsequent hour or part thereof - RM1 \nMaximum per entry per day - RM5 \n \nLost Ticket - RM30
// Help Info 5
